name: Cricket - Master Blaster Mania Free
description:
A fun, simple yet addictive Cricket game with a single touch gameplay. Hit Fours and Sixes to make high scores. Smash the boundaries, make high scores, challenge your friends through leaderboard.

Cricket Master Blaster Mania Features :

- Unique Art style - HD quality Handmade cartoon style graphics.
- 2 different Game modes - Time mode and Quick Play.
- Make sure to hit the boundaries with the right timing.
- Beautiful animations for making scores.
- Dynamic balling system which will trouble you every time to play the best shot.
- Make High Score and challenge your friends through leader board.
- Realistic Sound tracks.

We developed this game to deliver great experience and fun in playing cricket game with just a single touch button.
